name: test_e2e_with_logs[042_XSS_REFL_007]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_REFL_007` |
| **Name** | Select onfocus XSS |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | reflected_xss |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<select onfocus=alert('XSS') autofocus>`
- **Encoded**: `%3Cselect%20onfocus%3Dalert%28%27XSS%27%29%20autofocus%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~17000ms
- **Timestamp**: 14:59:01.000 UTC
